thread.section_title: Hotel De Buci by MH - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfection!!!
thread.title_full: Perfection!!! - Review of Hotel De Buci by MH, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Chaser05
title: Perfection!!!
text: OMG!! What an amazing hotel!! Our room was large, spotless and beautiful!! The location is the best!! The staff is the real crown jewel!! Sanjay was outstanding!! Every need was met. Julian was so helpfully and kind!! We had a trip of a lifetime because of Sanjay and his staff at the Hotel de Buci!! We cannot wait to go back!! We were traveling with our 11 year old son. This was his first trip to Paris. They made him feel so special and comfortable. If you want a real, luxurious and fabulous Parisian experience this is the hotel for you!! ‚ù§
